Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared

Interface Summary
Activatible An object with activation that is excitable and decayable
LearnableActivatible An Activatible that has a base level activation.
Link  
Linkable A object that can have links attached to it
Node Node represents a Concept in LIDA.
NodeStructure A NodeStructure holds a collection of Nodes an Links.
 

Class Summary
ActivatibleDriver A generic class to manage a group of Activatibles
ActivatibleImpl generic Activatible Implementation.
ActivatibleImplTest  
BasedActivatibleImplTest  
DynamicNodeStructure  
LearnableActivatibleImpl  
LinkImpl  
LinkImplTest This is a JUnit class which can be used to test methods of the LinkImpl class
NodeFactory Standard factory for the framework
NodeImpl Default Node Implementation
NodeImplTest This is a JUnit class which can be used to test methods of the NodeImpl class
NodeStructureImpl  
NodeStructureImplTest This is a JUnit class which can be used to test methods of the NodeStructureImpl class
 

Enum Summary
LinkType  
NodeClass Used to differentiate kinds of nodes.
